mapper.update:
update member
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
verified = #{verified,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
profile_photo_path = #{profilePhotoPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qq = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER},
company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=DATE},
valid = #{valid,jdbcType=BIT},
complaint = #{complaint,jdbcType=INTEGER},
profile_photo_id = #{profilePhotoId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
auto_login_identifier = #{autoLoginIdentifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_post_time = #{lastPostTime,jdbcType=DATE},
reset_password_token = #{resetPasswordToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_token_date = #{lastTokenDate,jdbcType=DATE},
school_organization = #{schoolOrganization,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creadits = #{creadits,jdbcType=INTEGER},
student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
block_list = #{blockList,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
applied_job_ids = #{appliedJobIds,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
liked_job_ids = #{likedJobIds,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
liked_sh_ids = #{likedShIds,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
favorite_job_ids = #{favoriteJobIds,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
favorite_sh_ids = #{favoriteShIds,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
favorite_resume_ids = #{favoriteResumeIds,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

UPDATE member SET username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, verified = #{verified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, profile_photo_path = #{profilePhotoPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qq = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=DATE}, valid = #{valid,jdbcType=BIT}, complaint = #{complaint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, profile_photo_id = #{profilePhotoId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, auto_login_identifier = #{autoLoginIdentifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_post_time = #{lastPostTime,jdbcType=DATE}, reset_password_token = #{resetPasswordToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_token_date = #{lastTokenDate,jdbcType=DATE}, school_organization = #{schoolOrganization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creadits = #{creadits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, student_id = #{studentId,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, block_list = #{blockList,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, applied_job_ids = #{appliedJobIds,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, liked_job_ids = #{likedJobIds,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, liked_sh_ids = #{likedShIds,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, favorite_job_ids = #{favoriteJobIds,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, favorite_sh_ids = #{favoriteShIds,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, favorite_resume_ids = #{favoriteResumeIds,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT mem.*, r.* FROM ( SELECT id FROM member WHERE username = #{username} ) info, member mem LEFT JOIN role r ON r.rid IN (SELECT role_rid FROM member_role WHERE member_id = info.id) WHERE mem.id = info.id
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM member WHERE username = #{username})
SELECT * FROM member mem WHERE mem.email = #{email}
